text.section: This section does not apply to a lawyer admitted to the bar of the State while acting within the scope of the profession of the lawyer.

section.section:
Except as otherwise provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection, before a person acts as a reinsurance manager or reinsurance broker in the State, the person:
in the case of a person that maintains an office in the State:
in the case of a person that maintains an office in another state:

Before a person acts as a reinsurance manager for a reinsurer domiciled in the State, the person must:
obtain a license under this subtitle; or
qualify as an insurance producer under Title 10, Subtitle 1 of this article.

This subsection applies to a person that maintains an office in the State either directly or as a member or employee of a firm or association or as an officer, director, or employee of a corporation that maintains an office in the State.
